lines.text: What are you lookin' at, butthead?

[after tripping a scientist]
Have a nice trip, see you next WINTER!

[after short-circuiting the lab, and trapping Doc in his own office, he knocks]
Hello! Hello! Dr. Brown!
Biff! How in the blazes did you get here?

[revealing the tied up scientists]
Why don't you ask these bozos?

[Biff removes the tape off of the scientist's mouth]
Dr. Brown. Our team was conducting an experiment back in 1955.
Hey! I'm not the one to pass on a free ride!
Go fourth time travelers, and remember the future is what you make it!
